mdRecord.dcterms:title: WVU and Salem
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Leasure, Al
mdRecord.dcterms:description: (University of West Virginia and Salem College! Graduated with A.B. Degree 1924.)(Mother was one of the first to graduate from Salem College.)(WVU) (Salem)(Married June 19, 1941 to Helen Louise Froelich, Gridley, Illinois. One daughter and one son!)(Coached St. Patrick's High and twice took basketball team to nat'l. tournament.)(Teacher and coach, Virginia and West Virginia high schools and colleges 1923 to 1931.)
The cartoon is part of a set that was made into a small booklet.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: American
Cartoons (Commentary)
Holt, Rush Dew, 1905-1955
Politics and government
West Virginia
